conversations.lastMessage: Cabinet meeting moved to 2pm. Need your input on regional development funding proposal.
Hospital capacity report ready for review. Some concerning trends in regional areas.
Opposition amendment could derail education bill. Strategy meeting needed ASAP.
Social media analytics show positive sentiment on infrastructure announcement. Full report attached.
Polling data from swing seats looking strong. Recommend additional resources for Tasmania.
Budget projections updated. Surplus tracking better than expected due to mining royalties.
